Event ends June 21st!

Hey there bud, I'm working to setup a party. It's about that time of year for my birthday so I'm going to need some help getting this all setup for everyone to come out to enjoy it! It would really help if you could gather up some liquor for the party. We'll need quite a few bottles though.

I found a location, but it was swarming with locals. I got shot up a bit and needed to be bandaged...those fuckers kept throwing stun grenades at me and I barely got out alive. I want you to go out and get my revenge. Go toy with your food before you kill it. Flash and stun the shit out of some folks and then take 'em out.
668858720221bbe5f306b22f startedMessageT: Właśnie dlatego zlecam moje zadania innym. Jestem za stary na to gówno.

668858720221bbe5f306b238 startedMessageT: Check out the chalet, the resort, the busted up broken house, and both dockhouses for me. Find somewhere relatively quiet and has lots of room. Also a great view.
668858720221bbe5f306b238 successMessaget: Przejże twoje notatki i wybiorę miejscówke która mi się spodoba.

668858720221bbe5f306b24e description:
Event ends June 21st!

Alright, I've decided. I want to hold the party at the busted up, ancient, falling apart house. It has a certain vibe to it that I like, and it's relatively quiet and has lots of room. Plus, it would be funny as shit to see people stumbling around drunk in there. Level floor? Who needs that. Not to mention the great ocean side view and the glorious scenic view of the lighthouse itself. Go out there, clean out any locales and report back.
668858720221bbe5f306b24e startedMessageT: Nie mogę się doczekać, za niedługo impreza!
668858720221bbe5f306b24e successMessaget: Dziękuje za wyczyszczenie lokalizacji. Czas na zorganizowanie imprezy!
668858720221bbe5f306b263 description:
Event ends June 21st!

The liquor that you gave me, I'm giving it back to you to go deliver to the site. There should be a 'bar-esque' type area, go ahead and store all the bottles behind the counter. Try to hide them so nobody steals that shit.
668858720221bbe5f306b263 startedMessageT: Ukryj je. Nie chcę zacząć imprezy i dowiedzieć się, że cały nasz alkohol został skradziony.
668858720221bbe5f306b263 successMessaget: We'll get this party started, but I'm gunna need you to make a bunch of noise in the other areas of the region.
668858720221bbe5f306b278: Wyeliminuj wszelkie cele w regionie Latarni
668858720221bbe5f306b274 description:
Event ends June 21st!

Unfortunately, you aren't invited - not because I don't like you, but because I need you to go make a shitload of noise in other parts of the region. It'll keep my guests and myself safe from the locals while we get blasted off our ass.
668858720221bbe5f306b274 startedMessageT: Make tons of noise, draw them all away from the party so we can get loud as hell!
668858720221bbe5f306b274 successMessaget: It's been a good party so far.

Event ends June 21st!

We're really enjoying the party, thank you for all your work to get this setup - if you could do me one more favour to knock the socks off these guests.. take these flares and shoot them off at the giant rock overlooking the broken house. The rock is to the north of the house and should have a good sightline of the house itself. Make sure to angle them about 45 degrees or we won't be able to see it!
668858720221bbe5f306b285 startedMessageT: Weź to, idź na miejsce i je wystrzel!
668858720221bbe5f306b285 successMessaget: To była zajebista impreza, dziękuje ci za wszystko!
668858720221bbe5f306b297 description:
Event ends June 21st!

One last thing, where's my fucking gift? I get you spent a lot of time setting this up and providing security but it's my birthday. That deserves a gift. Since you didn't think to get me something, take this flare and go fire it off. My guys will fly over head and drop off a package for you. I just ask that you delivery one of the sealed crates to me. You can have the rest.
668858720221bbe5f306b297 startedMessageT: My guys will watch for the signal everywhere except the factory or the laboratory. Fucking obviously.
668858720221bbe5f306b297 successMessaget: Awesome, thanks again for all the work. I'll make sure you're adequately paid for your time. Maybe.

Event ends July 14th!

I'm running low on water, and it's getting fucking hot out there. I can buy us a couple more days but I really need a resupply. Think you can find me some cases of purified water, some water bottls, and maybe some purification tablets? I'd really appreciate it.

Event ends July 14th!

The guys are wondering how you do it wearing all that armour when it's getting so humid outside. I told 'em that you're a fiend in summer and don't need armour to do your job. I might have overstepped a little bit but now I need you to prove me right. You're a badass right? You can take out some locals while only wearing a baseball cap and a scav vest? Right? Don't bitch out now.
668858720221bbe5f306b2a9 startedMessageT: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
668858720221bbe5f306b2a9 successMessaget: I knew you'd do well, protection is just a bonus for you.

Event ends July 14th!

I need somewhere to hide out for a couple weeks. The air system in this place has broken and it's getting way too hot and humid in here. If you can find me a temporary base of operations in a cooler area of the region that'll do just fine. Somewhere well wooded probably. There's a couple areas around the USEC Camp that was setup, might be a good spot for us to hideout for a bit. Go check the area out and let me know what you find.
668858720221bbe5f306b2b2 startedMessageT: I'm gunna kill my engineer. Fuckin' ran off after the air system broke. I might have brought him on as a favour.
668858720221bbe5f306b2b2 successMessaget: I'll review this report and let you know where I've picked out.

Event ends July 14th!

That bunker sounds perfect, couple beds, underground, easy access to communications and some supplies left behind? I'll take it. If you can go back out there and clear out the area it'll be appreciated. I'll also need you to run out some of these supplies and stash them in the bunker for us to show up after you clear it all out.
668858720221bbe5f306b2ca startedMessageT: I might have to make this a permanent home...if it's not too busy with locals anyway. Probably won't though.
668858720221bbe5f306b2ca successMessaget: We'll pack up and head out to the temporary home, thanks for doing that!

668858720221bbe5f306b2e0 description:
Event ends July 14th!

We're all set and good to go in our temporary home. Thanks for getting us setup! We've got safety, supplies, and a nice cool underground bunker to deal with the heat. All I have left to ask is to play a little joke on the locals around here. Show them you aren't anything to mess around with. Why don't you take a handful of locals out while you're under the effects of dehydration? Since it's so fucking hot outside it should be easy enough to get dehydrated!
668858720221bbe5f306b2e0 successMessaget: Maybe they won't fuck with you anymore. Thanks again for all the help!
668858720221bbe5f306b2ea description: You want to work with me? You gotta prove it. I've been lookin' for someone. If you can take a couple guys out, maybe I can trust you to start lookin' for 'em.
668858720221bbe5f306b2ea startedMessageT: Happy that you took me up on my offer. Get to work.
668858720221bbe5f306b2ea successMessaget: Well shit, I didn't expect you to come back alive. Good work - I'm hearin' rumblings about where my guy might have gone off to. I'll send you on your way for now. Come back in a few. Take this for your trouble.

668858720221bbe5f306b30c startedMessageT: Get a move on! If those locals are still around when the ambulance gets there, we're going to be riding down shit creek.
668858720221bbe5f306b30c successMessaget: Thanks for clearing them out, that'll make out life a bit easier soon. I'll let you know if we see that ambulance getting closer to the region.

668858720221bbe5f306b352 startedMessageT: I've got an idea of who is behind this, but if you can make it out there and get eyes on target it'll confirm my suspicious. Try to inspect each of them for identifying marks.

668858720221bbe5f306b35f description: Did you review that data? It'll give you the next location of targets. Get over to the lighthouse and see if you can wrangle some information out of the traitors out there.
668858720221bbe5f306b35f startedMessageT: Yet another lead..when are we going to find him?
668858720221bbe5f306b35f successMessaget: I'm glad you took those guys out and managed to get out unscathed, did you find anything while you were out there?
668858720221bbe5f306b373: Eliminate any targets around the blue chalet

668858720221bbe5f306b36f startedMessageT: While I review this data, go take a stroll. Return soon!
668858720221bbe5f306b36f successMessaget: Dobra wiadomość, myślę, że znaleźliśmy gdzie jest mój człowiek.

668858720221bbe5f306b3a6: Turn in found in raid Intelligence Folder

668858720221bbe5f306b3a4 startedMessageT: Na co czekasz? Idź znajdź te jebane informacje!
668858720221bbe5f306b3a4 successMessaget: We'll review this and let you know if the intel is any good. Thanks for risking your ass to get it, let's see if it pans out.
668858720221bbe5f306b3b0 description: That intel didn't give us much, but it does reference a few rooms in the dormatories on Customs. Go poke around and see if you can find anything out of the ordinary. I don't have high hopes for this lead, but maybe we'll get lucky.
668858720221bbe5f306b3b0 successMessaget: We should have known this was a dead end, random intelligence - my ass! I'll let you know when I've got a new lead to track down. Thanks for risking your rear, I know Reshala likes to hang out around there and that group ain't easy to deal with.

668858720221bbe5f306b3d1 startedMessageT: Tylko strzały w głowę. Zajeb ich.

668858720221bbe5f306b3e4 description: As if the last lesson you taught them wasn't enough, that gang's taunting us. One of my guys came back from a supply run, broken and bruised - yet they have spread all over the region. What cowards. Let's taunt them right back. Track them down, go find them anywhere you can, and shoot them in the face, but do it from up close for good measure. I want them to see the whites of your eyes. 10 casualties ought to be enough, they don't want this smoke.
668858720221bbe5f306b3e4 startedMessageT: Tylko strzały w głowę. Zajeb ich.
668858720221bbe5f306b3e4 successMessaget: Their leader reached out and wanted to make amends, I'll let you know when I've got a meet location setup. You're going to go there and take him out. I've had enough of this!

To make amends, the factions reached out and told us they'd be willing to 'forgive' us if we took out their leader. I think we should go ahead and do that, but I want to drive fear into his heart first..
668858720221bbe5f306b3f1 startedMessageT: Go kill as many of these scavengers as you can.
668858720221bbe5f306b3f1 successMessaget: Haha! We're just toyin' with him now. Let's go for round two before we step this up.
668858720221bbe5f306b3f1 failMessageText: You killed Tagilla! You're gunna have to try again - usually someone takes up his persona pretty quickly.
668858720221bbe5f306b403 description: I got news from Tagilla, he's fuckin' furious at us. He's ramped up bringing in scavengers from around the area, the factory is overloaded. We should take some more out before we go after Tagilla. See if we can rattle him a bit more before we take him head on.
668858720221bbe5f306b403 startedMessageT: Go kill as many of these scavengers as you can, I want that place cleared out. Leave him by himself to think about what he's started.
668858720221bbe5f306b403 successMessaget: Oh he's fuckin' pissed at us. I think it's time to end this, good job.
668858720221bbe5f306b403 failMessageText: You killed Tagilla! You're gunna have to try again - usually someone takes up his persona pretty quickly.
668858720221bbe5f306b419: Znajdź i przynieś jego czapkę z daszkiem

Go to the Factory and wipe those metal floors with his skull. Bring back his baseball cap as proof for the faction leaders. Hopefully we'll make some amends with them..after all you did take the heads off quite a few of them.
668858720221bbe5f306b414 startedMessageT: Tagilla is a tough customer, take this with you for protection.
668858720221bbe5f306b414 successMessaget: The Factory should be clean for awhile until another impersonator moves in. Hopefully whoever takes up the mantle isn't as brutal as Tagilla was.

My guys could use a 'pick me up' and I was thinking you could get some supplies for me to give out. There's usually a lot of scavengers around the mall so check out the 2nd floor - there's quite a few drink and food shops around there so maybe you can nick some off the folks who nicked 'em from the stores.
668858720221bbe5f306b42e startedMessageT: Let's go to the mall, today! Fuck, I hate that saying but it's so damn catchy.

668858720221bbe5f306b447 description: Alright, heres the deal. Those guys at the party? Yeah, they were fighting about whether or not they would continue their bet. It's a dumb bet, but someone has passed away over it. I need to get their morale in order from the passing of their comrade. I want you to take this bet to the next level and go out there and prove to them that it can be done. You'll need to survive and extract from every location we know of, all while not using any healing items. If you can do this, I'll handsomely reward you with a personal training session.
668858720221bbe5f306b447 successMessaget: Haha! I can't believe you did it! I'm sure the gang will be happy to hear about this feat, I'll gather them up and tell them your tale!
668858720221bbe5f306b480 description: My guys got a HUGE morale boost from you trip around Tarkov. They bet you couldn't also go take out all the local gang leaders. If you can do this we'll do a second round of one-on-one training. I might be able to get my guys rallied enough to do the impossible if you can pull this one off. Good luck and stay safe!
668858720221bbe5f306b480 successMessaget: I just...I just can't believe you made it back in one piece. If my guys come up with any more challenges for you, I'll make sure to let you know.
668858720221bbe5f306b4cd: Eliminate all targets without dying and while not wearing body armour
668858720221bbe5f306b4a9 description: Well, I got another one for you. The guys decided that the last one was too easy and they want you to try and complete this challenge without wearing any body armour while taking the local bosses head on. Maybe they should come up with some other kind of challenge, this is getting repetitive.
668858720221bbe5f306b4a9 startedMessageT: Remember, no armour while fighting them!
668858720221bbe5f306b4a9 successMessaget: I'll let them know how much a big man you are, I wouldn't have even bothered trying to do that. If my guys come up with any more challenges for you, I'll make sure to let you know.
668858720221bbe5f306b4d8 description: I ripped into my guys about their lame ass attempts at bets, because it was just turning into the same shit over and over again. They finally grouped up and decided on something different. Granted, this one might take you awhile to do.
668858720221bbe5f306b4d8 startedMessageT: These bloodhounds, as they call them, are rarely seen. Make sure to fight them if you see them to complete the bet.
668858720221bbe5f306b4d8 successMessaget: That took you awhile, but you managed to do it. Those guys will be proud of you. I'll let you know if they come up with something different again!

668858720221bbe5f306b51f: Choose to continue working with Apollo or Maximus
668858720221bbe5f306b51e description: Okay, you're making this difficult for me now. I'm friends with both Apollo and Maximus. They're not happy with you, and I'm not happy with you forcing me into this position. You should have been more discrete when completing your tasks and we wouldn't have gotten to this point. They wouldn't have found out that you're working for the other one. You'll need to pay me so I can split the cash between them in order to recover some goodwill with them. At this point though, it's up to you for who you want to continue working with. They're both great but they aren't friends.
668858720221bbe5f306b51e startedMessageT: Let me know when you've decided by handing over the cash
668858720221bbe5f306b51e successMessaget: I'll give you one task for each of them. Whichever you choose to take will be the one you will work with.
668858720221bbe5f306b527: Znajdź laboratorium narkotyków w regionie latarni
668858720221bbe5f306b528: Handover found in raid eTG regenerative stims
668858720221bbe5f306b529: Handover found in raid 'Obdolbos' cocktail injectors
668858720221bbe5f306b52a: Handover found in raid Adrenaline injectors
668858720221bbe5f306b52b: Handover found in raid Propital regenerative stims
668858720221bbe5f306b524 description: An old friend reached out to me, he heard you took on the big boss man himself, Tagilla. We thought you might be a good fit for a couple tasks he has lined up without any takers so far. First one on the list is to go track down that drug lab that popped up around the lighthouse. I'm not sure exactly where it is, but seeing as you've been there a few times - you might know where it is. Once you've found it, gather up some of the stims they've been making and hand them over for testing.
668858720221bbe5f306b524 startedMessageT: Some of these stims might be a bit rare to find, so take your time. He's in no rush.
668858720221bbe5f306b524 successMessaget: Thanks boss, I'll let him know you've got the goods. Already have a second task lined up for you!
668858720221bbe5f306b538: Eliminate PMCs while under the effects of 'Obdolbos 2' cocktail
668858720221bbe5f306b53b: Survive and extract from your current location
668858720221bbe5f306b534 description: That friend of mine, we call him Apollo - he's testing the stims you found but while he can do that in the lab with those..unfortunately this stim can't be tested as easily. We'll need you to risk it for the biscuit and shoot this thing into your arms and see how it makes you feel.
668858720221bbe5f306b534 startedMessageT: If it makes you feel it, you might need more than one.
668858720221bbe5f306b534 successMessaget: How much of that do you actually remember? I'll let you know when he's got that next task lined up.
668858720221bbe5f306b545: Explore EMERCOM Medical Care unit for potential surveillance spots
668858720221bbe5f306b548: Explore Techlight for potential surveillance spots
668858720221bbe5f306b54f: Survive and extract from the mall
668858720221bbe5f306b542 description: I need you to find a dead drop location for us to utilize with Apollo. Those results you got from raging gave him some much needed insight into the creation of these new drugs. Find us a spot at the mall to transfer goods and get the hell out of there safely.
668858720221bbe5f306b542 startedMessageT: To prawdopodobnie najprostsze zadanie jakie kiedykolwiek miałeś.
668858720221bbe5f306b542 successMessaget: Alright, when I pick which one we're going with, I'll let you know.
668858720221bbe5f306b55c: Flip on the power at the mall
668858720221bbe5f306b55e: Place M.U.L.E at dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage
668858720221bbe5f306b55f: Place AHF1-M at dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage
668858720221bbe5f306b560: Place Trimadol at dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage
668858720221bbe5f306b561: Place P22 at dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage
668858720221bbe5f306b559 description: Are you ready for OPERATION: Squirrel Nuts? You like the name? ... It wasn't my idea, OK? We've decided to make the dead drop inside ULTRA Medical Storage. Hopefully being a hard to access room will make this drop a bit safer. You're going to need to go flip on the power, place a camera just outside Techlight overlooking the room, and then stash the stims inside.
668858720221bbe5f306b559 successMessaget: Apollo should be on their way now, hopefully this goes smoothly.
668858720221bbe5f306b571: Handover found in raid lower half-masks
668858720221bbe5f306b56c description: Apollo reported to me that those stims were missing from the dead drop. Why does nothing go to plan on the first try? It's like a damn action movie. We reviewed the footage from the camera and it looks like a local body broke into the room shortly after you left and nicked the goods. I'm trying to prevent Apollo from ripping your head off so you better make amends. Go take out some of the locals in the mall and try to recover the goods. Bring back some of their masks as proof, they tend to wear them to hide their identities.
668858720221bbe5f306b56c startedMessageT: Apollo is pissed, you better make it snappy.
668858720221bbe5f306b56c successMessaget: Well done, but Apollo is still pissed at you, you're going to have to get back in their good graces.
668858720221bbe5f306b578 description: I think I've got an idea to keep the jobs flowing from Apollo. The dead drop went wrong, and I'm not blaming you - but Apollo is, they really needed those stims for their research. You're going to have to find more of them, and they need to be in pristine condition. If you can get them and hand them over to me I'll sort out the details to get them over to Apollo.
668858720221bbe5f306b578 successMessaget: I've sent a courier to get the goods over to Apollo, I'll let you know if he comes back in a better mood.
668858720221bbe5f306b583 description: Bad news bears...Not only is Apollo still upset at that job with the dead drop, while you were on your way to redeeming yourself for further jobs, they got news that you're also working with Maximus. Apollo is very pissed about it but is willing to let take one more task...for now. You need to acquire the census from the streets for them.
668858720221bbe5f306b583 startedMessageT: Get the census for Apollo, I have no idea what they're looking for in it but you better get it quick.
668858720221bbe5f306b583 successMessaget: I'll courier this over to them. I'll let you know when I have any more information
668858720221bbe5f306b58f: Znajdź i dostań się do pomieszczenia testowego w Laboratorium
668858720221bbe5f306b590: Handover any combination of found in raid P22, L1, SJ1, SJ12, or 3-(b-TG) injectors
668858720221bbe5f306b58c description: APOLLO: I'm glad you've decided to work with me. Fuck that Maximus. They broke all my shit when they moved out and split off to form their own crew. I'm in need of some more stims for testing, a wide range should do. The best place to get them is to venture into the Laboratory and gain access to the locked testing room. I believe you'll need to find a keycard marked all black to get access. I'll need a variety of stims - P22, L1, SJ1, SJ12, or 3-(b-TG) injectors should do the trick. In the future I'll relay tasks through Scorpion instead of showing up here to talk to you personally.
668858720221bbe5f306b58c startedMessageT: The testing room isn't easy to gain access to, but it's worth it for all the medical supplies locked behind those doors.
668858720221bbe5f306b58c successMessaget: I'll get to testing these right away, I'll have a new task for you soon. Again - thank you for working with me.
668858720221bbe5f306b599: Handover found in raid Electronic Components
668858720221bbe5f306b59a: Handover found in raid COFDM Wireless Signal Transmitters
668858720221bbe5f306b598 description: News of your success defeating Tagilla has made it through my crew. Someone by the name of Maximus has reached out asking if you'd like to work with him. To get started, you'll have find some electronics for me to build a radio and amplifier.
668858720221bbe5f306b598 startedMessageT: I need all of the parts, and in pristine condition for me to build the radio and amplifier.
668858720221bbe5f306b5a3: Go to the tower at the mall
668858720221bbe5f306b5a4: Place Far-forward GPS Signal Amplifier as high as you can
668858720221bbe5f306b5a5: Place Radio Repeater as high as you can
668858720221bbe5f306b5a0 description: Now that I've got the parts, I've made these for you. You'll have to go set up the radio and amplifier at the mall. Find the highest point you can and install them. He'll relay through that to speak with me.
668858720221bbe5f306b5a0 startedMessageT: Remember, it's got to be the highest point you can find.
668858720221bbe5f306b5a0 successMessaget: As soon as you got those installed, I made contact and he's already got plans for you.
668858720221bbe5f306b5b4: Place Gas Analyzer at the source
668858720221bbe5f306b5ac description: It appears that Maximus is investigating the area around the laboratory, he thinks that there's something in there causing the locals in that area to be stronger, faster, and more badass than normal. You'll need to venture in, take out some of the locals, find any sources of contamination and place a gas analyzer if you find the area.
668858720221bbe5f306b5ac startedMessageT: The laboratory is a dangerous place, make sure to bring extra medical supplies and heavy armour. Anything you lose there is lost for good.
668858720221bbe5f306b5ac successMessaget: Whew, I bet that was a tough one. He's going to gather the data from that analyzer.
668858720221bbe5f306b5be: Leg meta Raiders while experiencing Pain at The Lab
668858720221bbe5f306b5b9 description: The data is back from that gas analyzer you installed. Maximus thinks the fumes are making the locals stronger in every way, including how healthy they seem to be. It's a medical marvel. He's asked for you to test their resilience - If you go into the laboratory while in pain, they should swarm you. After you're good and surrounded, aim for their legs and cripple them. Might want to bring flesh rounds instead of standard armour penetrating rounds.
668858720221bbe5f306b5b9 startedMessageT: Remember, it's a tough place. Bring medical supplies and heavy armour. Protect yourself.
668858720221bbe5f306b5b9 successMessaget: It does sure seem like those guys are tougher than normal. I don't know what this means for us if they start venturing out - but I don't want to find out.
668858720221bbe5f306b5c3 description: We know the gangs that hang around in the laboratory are weirdly stronger than the rest of the locals..but we've heard of a group that call themselves the 'Goon Squad' - it's a fucking stupid name but that's what they picked. These guys seem tough. Too tough. They tend to roam in a pack together and aren't usually spotted in the same place for long. See if you can take them on, please do try to gather some data on their combat strategies and general health. It would help Maximus greatly.
668858720221bbe5f306b5c3 startedMessageT: The 'Good Squad' tends to be a bit telepathic in their movements together, I wonder if they are brothers?
668858720221bbe5f306b5d2 description: That so-called 'Goon Squad' seemed way tougher than they should have been...is this all connected? While Maximus reviews your data, he's heard of yet another group. They don't have a name, but we know they travel at night. If you find yourself alone at night, and travelling through the tall grass and trees you may just hear their whispers. Don't get too close to them - we've heard they have really mastered their Melee Proficiency, unlike *some* others.
668858720221bbe5f306b5d2 startedMessageT: Take your best headphones and try to listen for them. They're not normally seen, but that's by choice. Those who have seen them have not usually survived.
668858720221bbe5f306b5d2 successMessaget: I'll get this data passed over to Maximus as soon as I can. I must warn you, he's heard that you have been working with Apollo..he isn't very happy.
668858720221bbe5f306b5de description: Maximus found out that you've been working with Apollo... seems the two of them have beef with each other. I'm not sure if you're going to be able to keep working for them both. Maximus wants you to go pick up an encrypted laptop their associate dropped off, it's near the lighthouse in one of the houses near the shore.
668858720221bbe5f306b5de startedMessageT: Nie wiem, co jest na tym laptopie, ale on go potrzebuje.
668858720221bbe5f306b5de successMessaget: I'll let you know when I've got any information for you.
668858720221bbe5f306b5ec: Eliminate Raiders at the Laboratory from a distance of more than 35m
668858720221bbe5f306b5e7 description: MAXIMUS: I appreciate you working with me. Apollo hates me for what I did to them when I decided to branch out and start my own crew. They were holding me back and I couldn't take it anymore. Don't believe whatever they tell you. Now that we're back to working together, I'm still investigating the strengths of the random guys around Tarkov. I figured we would go back to the source, it's possible they are also getting some type of immunity boost from the medical kits they carry on them. Take a bunch of them out and gather their medical packs for investigation. In the future I'll relay tasks through Scorpion instead of showing up here to talk to you personally.
668858720221bbe5f306b5e7 startedMessageT: Head on out to the Laboratory and take out some juiced up raiders.
668858720221bbe5f306b5e7 successMessaget: I'll start looking through these medical kits, maybe there's something in here worth something.
